com.mapbox.android.gestures

Class StandardScaleGestureDetector

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapbox.android.gestures.BaseGesture<L>
      • com.mapbox.android.gestures.MultiFingerGesture<L>
        • com.mapbox.android.gestures.ProgressiveGesture<StandardScaleGestureDetector.StandardOnScaleGestureListener>
          • com.mapbox.android.gestures.StandardScaleGestureDetector

  • public class StandardScaleGestureDetector
extends ProgressiveGesture<StandardScaleGestureDetector.StandardOnScaleGestureListener>
    Gesture detector handling scale gesture.

      • isSloppyGesture

        protected boolean isSloppyGesture()
        Description copied from class: MultiFingerGesture
        Check if we have a sloppy gesture. Sloppy gestures can happen if the edge of the user's hand is touching the screen, for example.

        Thanks to Almer Thie (code.almeros.com).

        Overrides:
        isSloppyGesture in class MultiFingerGesture<StandardScaleGestureDetector.StandardOnScaleGestureListener>
        Returns:
        true if we detect sloppy gesture, false otherwise

      • provideHandledTypes

      • isScalingOut

        public boolean isScalingOut()
        Check whether user is scaling out.
        Returns:
        true if user is scaling out, false if user is scaling in

      • getSpanSinceStartThreshold

        public float getSpanSinceStartThreshold()
        Get the threshold span in pixels between initial fingers position and current needed for this detector to qualify it as a scale gesture.
        Returns:
        span threshold

      • setSpanSinceStartThreshold

        public void setSpanSinceStartThreshold(float spanSinceStartThreshold)
        Set the threshold span in pixels between initial fingers position and current needed for this detector to qualify it as a scale gesture.

        We encourage to set those values from dimens to accommodate for various screen sizes.

        Parameters:
        spanSinceStartThreshold - delta span threshold

      • setSpanSinceStartThresholdResource

        public void setSpanSinceStartThresholdResource(int spanSinceStartThresholdDimen)
        Set the threshold span in dp between initial fingers position and current needed for this detector to qualify it as a scale gesture.
        Parameters:
        spanSinceStartThresholdDimen - delta span threshold

        Returns:
        Scale factor.

        public float getStartSpan()
        Return the average distance between each of the pointers forming the gesture in progress through the focal point, when the gesture was started.
        Returns:
        Distance between pointers in pixels.
